tweet: We're now in day 7 of the #TrumpShutdown. Democrats are committed to reopening our government and getting back to work for the American people. Learn more about what government services are impacted by @realDonaldTrump's shutdown:  https://bobbyscott.house.gov/serving-you/questions-and-answers-on-the-impacts-of-republican-government-shutdown …

I am particularly gratified that this bill incorporates key elements of the Youth P.R.O.M.I.S.E. Act, which I first introduced in Congress over a decade ago, as a way to reduce juvenile delinquency and gang involvement.
The Juvenile Justice Reform Act is guided by the best-available evidence and the best interests of young offenders, at-risk youth, and communities across the country.

I am thrilled that Congress finally passed the Juvenile Justice Reform Act. This is the culmination of a multi-year, bipartisan effort to improve our juvenile justice system.  https://go.usa.gov/xEqty
